help-file.title: SPEC_LIST
help-file.content:
-Alchemist: Battle-Forger -Anti-Paladin: Hellspawn, Dark Knight, Demonic Rider -Bard: Disharmonist, Scoundrel, Minstrel -Berserker: Mauler, Ragelord -Cleric: Healer, Holyman, Zealot -Conjurer: Air Magus, Water Magus, Fire Magus, Earth Magus -Dreadlord: Deathlord, Shadowlord -Druid: Storm Druid, Forest Druid -Ethermancer: Windtalker, Frost Magus, Cosmomancer -Mercenary: Brigand, Bounty Hunter -Monk: Dragon disciple, Elaphidist -Necromancer: Diabolis, Necrolyte, Reaper -Paladin: Crusader, Cavalier -Ranger: Blademaster, Huntsman -Reaver: Flame reaver, Blood reaver -Rogue: Assassin, Bravo, Thief -Shaman: Elementalist, Animalist, Spiritualist -Sorcerer: Shadowmage, Wizard, Wildmage -Unholy-Piper: Disharmonist, Scoundrel, Minstrel -Warrior: Swordsman, Guardian
NOTE: Use help <specname> for information on a specific specialization.
